attributes.action: Give 100% tax relief to key workers.
attributes.additional_details: Financially it makes very little difference for any key workers to self isolate for two weeks and receive an 80% wage off the government. But they are still working hard and risking their own lives, and I think they deserve to be shown that their efforts are appreciated.
attributes.background: A large % of the work force are now at home self isolating and getting a 80% wage. Front line workers and key workers are still working, risking their health to keep the UK running and are getting taxed to do it. All key workers should have 100% tax relief until all businesses can go back to work.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
